room_title: Escape room "Patient Zero" by 1 Hour to Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This was an awesome escape room. Challenging, but not too challenging, and extremely creative. We did it with four people, but we all had a lot of experience with escape rooms. Highly recommend!!!

room_title: Escape room "Patient Zero" by 1 Hour to Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I loved it. The staff was very friendly and funny. I would recommend to everyone. Best escape room I've ever done.

room_title: Escape room "Patient Zero" by 1 Hour to Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This was my second room to do here, and we did Zero. The theme of the game is very fun, and the ship's interactive AI is a very nice touch instead of having just a walkie-talkie game master. It fits very well with the room's story and motif. The room itself posed some really fun puzzles and challenges, as well as a good amount of different things to do. It was the first room that I've done that an 8 person room actually felt like it was sufficient in puzzles and space for 8 people. Very well done.

room_title: Escape room "Patient Zero" by 1 Hour to Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: The absolute zero room was the most difficult room and we almost escaped. Staff was awesome and super helpful! Totally recommend!!
